form.official-title: To require the Secretary of the Treasury to determine improvements in the filing process for the excise tax on the use of heavy highway motor vehicles.

section.header: Study to improve administration of excise tax on use of heavy highway vehicles

subsection.text: The Secretary of the Treasury (or the Secretary’s designee) shall conduct a study on improving the filing process for the tax imposed by section 4481 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 (including the administration of any exceptions to the application, or suspension of collection, of such tax).

Not later than 180 days after the date of the enactment of this Act, the Secretary (or such designee) shall submit to the Committee on Ways and Means of the House of Representatives and the Committee on Finance of the Senate a report which—

paragraph.text: details the results of such study; and
includes a description of any changes the Secretary could make, and any suggested changes to statutory law, to improve such process.
